job.title: Software Design Engineer - C#, .NET, PLC, NPI, Robotics
job.description:
With an office in Anaheim, CA, we are a Fortune 500 powerhouse that partners with some of the world's best brands to develop and manufacture products that helps connect people and advance technology.
We are looking for several top-notch, Software Design Engineers to join our world-class team. You will be responsible for building turn-key complete solutions for our customers using the .NET platform as well as industrial machine vision systems at times. You will work with some of our partners to create and optimize solution implementations based on our customers specifications. If this role appeals to you, then please apply immediately as we're looking to move extremely fast!
What You Will Be Doing
Scope, design, code, debug, and document software projects from start to finish with a team or alone internally
Work with our software partners to create optimized solution implementations based on client requirements
Work with vision systems in integrating vision applications
Develop and deploy very complex control systems
Troubleshooting software and hardware
Travel up to 20%
What You Need for this Position
5+ years of Software Design Engineering experience
Knowledge of Object Oriented Design & Programming
Advanced with Microsoft Stack and .NET Platform, specifically C# and Visual Studio
Experienced with machine vision systems such as Cognex, Keyence, OpenCV, etc.
Experienced with MS Access Database and SQL Programming
Motion Control Systems and System Integration
Ability to trouble shoot software and hardware
Comfortable being client facing and working directly with our clients
Bonus Points
Familiarity of SEMI Standards
Experience with TwinCat3 or STX programming
What's In It for You
Benefits
For your hard work and dedication, you will be rewarded with a competitive base salary and excellent benefits including but not limited to
Next GENERATION products
Great Benefits
Generous Vacation Plan
Paid Holidays
Great work life balance
MASSIVE GROWTH
Work with the LATEST technologies
Interviews will be conducted this week and next week. Apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Pat.Befort@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : PB2-1643798 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Pat Befort - Recruiting Manager - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
